name: Telecommunications
description: Call centres providing customer support for telecommunication services, including phone, internet, and TV providers.

name: Financial Services
description: Call centres handling customer inquiries and transactions for banks, credit card companies, and other financial institutions.

name: Healthcare
description: Call centres providing patient support, medical billing, and insurance claims processing for healthcare providers and insurance companies.

name: Retail and E-commerce
description: Call centres handling customer service, returns, and sales support for online and brick-and-mortar retailers.

name: Travel and Hospitality
description: Call centres providing customer support for airlines, hotels, travel agencies, and other travel-related services.

name: Insurance
description: Call centres handling policy inquiries, claims processing, and customer service for insurance companies.

name: Technology and Software
description: Call centres providing technical support, troubleshooting, and customer service for software and technology companies.

name: Utilities
description: Call centres handling customer inquiries, billing, and service requests for utility companies, including electricity, gas, and water providers.

name: Government
description: Call centres providing citizen support, benefits processing, and information services for government agencies.

name: Education
description: Call centres handling student inquiries, admissions, and support services for educational institutions.

name: Real Estate
description: Call centres providing customer support, property inquiries, and transaction processing for real estate companies and property managers.

name: Automotive
description: Call centres handling customer inquiries, warranty support, and service scheduling for automotive manufacturers and dealerships.
